RelatedSentence: DONA ANA COUNTY , N.M. Dona Ana County Vector Control is offering free Gambusia fish to help curb the mosquito population in Las Cruces and the county .
The fish can eat five times their weight in mosquito larvae each day , officials said .
The fish can eat five times their weight in mosquito larvae each day , officials said .
According to Kenneth Scholar , a supervisor for Vector Control , it takes about six to 12 fish in any standing body of water to take out the mosquito population on a half - acre of land .
It 's important to get these fish out into the community during the spring and summer months when they 're most effective , Scholar said .
Bags will be offered at the site or residents can bring your own container .
